    symbol={\ensuremath{LS}},

    symbol={\ensuremath{G}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{TASK} }},
    description={a set of task groups, tasks in a groups have the same computational cost and input/output size}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{L^{L}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{LAYER_TASK}[_{l}]  \subseteq  {\glssymbol{TASK}}}},
